body_html: Yeah I think deprecating implicit dim choosing for now is reasonable. It'll give us more time to decide on defaults, but I really think we should do something with what we have right now

body: Yeah I think deprecating implicit dim choosing for now is reasonable. It'll give us more time to decide on defaults, but I really think we should do something with what we have right now
